author: CBS News
title: Extremists are using the coronavirus to recruit online
description: "People in desperate times embrace all sorts of ideas maybe they normally wouldn't ... and that's what extremists are providing: somebody to blame."
content:
REVERB is a new documentary series from CBSN Originals. Watch the episode "Extremists Next Door" in the video player above.
As cities and countries around the world take drastic steps to mitigate the impact of the coronavirus, extremist groups are trying to … [+4865 chars]
